statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -24 \\ 6 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -44 \\ 10 \\ -19 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ 84 \\ -18 \\ 37 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
